title: Person of Interest: Reese VS Hersh
author: POI Fights
comment: "I wonder if your employers would have showed you that kind of mercy." Probably not! This shows how much Reese has changed under Finch's guidance.
Does anyone find it funny that Reese beat up both Shaw's trainer and trainee?
0:55 Easily one of my favourite lines from Reese xD
Getting into a knife fight with a Green Beret...not a bright move, Hersh.
They're both adorable. Reese VS Hersh was the best! I also loved their scenes in 3x23. They would've made an unstoppable team.
description: Fight Scene from S02 X 15: Booked Solid
